description: Previously the word Binghi was used widely in similar fashion to the present-day use of the term Negro for peoples of African ancestry; see titles from this booklist and also writings of Xavier Herbert (e.g. in Capricornia), for example.

entries.meaning: (Australia, slang, ethnic slur) An Australian Aboriginal person.
examples: “Yeah,” he said, “them boongs are a useless lot. The sooner they all die off, the better.”
“The Abos are nothing but a pack of boozers. All they wanna' do is get pissed.” The man glared at his beer. “Useless, they are.”

entries.meaning: (Australia, slang, dated) A native of New Guinea or Malaysia.
examples: A couple of boongs came down and carried me up to the hut where our R.A.P. corporal was.
